timeline.message: Remove unused feature to simplify task creation
Give each thread from the factory a unique name, and allow single threads to be created without needing a factory
Create startup and JMX threads as agent threads
Avoid creating a thread factory just for single threads
Avoid creating a thread factory just for our single thread scheduler
Add support for simple delayed one-shot agent threads
Place agent shutdown hooks under the same agent thread group

timeline.bodyText: I think there is value in having all the expected threads enumerated in a single place...
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: sure, I can add string constants for them
replies.author: mcculls

replies.bodyText: How bout an enum with a strongly typed argument for the method?
replies.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: There are a couple of places like ClassLoadCallBack which use a computed thread name (ie. prefix plus class name) - but I think that's still doable because we only allow callbacks for specific classes. I'll see what it looks like with an enum.
replies.author: mcculls

timeline.message: Use enum to list known agent threads

timeline.bodyText: Does this result in any new/different thread names from previous releases?
timeline.author: tylerbenson

timeline.message:
Revert "Add support for simple delayed one-shot agent threads"

(moving this to a follow-up PR to rework the profiler scheduler)
